title: Kim Kardashian Shows Kids Riding Horses in Wyoming
text:
Kim Kardashian's family is going country!

The "Keeping Up With The Kardashians" star is trying her best to embrace the cowboy life while away in Wyoming with her kids.

Related:

Paris Hilton & Winnie Harlow Suffer Strange Wardrobe Malfunctions at KKW Beauty Launch

Kim Kardashian Dresses Kids in Cowboy Outfits After Squashing Wyoming Move

Kim Kardashian's 'Skims' Website Crashes Ahead Of Shapewear Line Launch

Kim Kardashian Revealed Her Troubling Medical Diagnosis

A Look Inside Kim Kardashian's SKIMS Shapewear Press Box

Kim shared an adorable photo showing North West and Chicago West on a horse Saturday.

Her oldest child with Kanye West can be seen hanging on tightly to her younger sister while Mom holds the reigns of the beautiful animal.

She simply captioned the shot, "Wyoming."

In the pic, the trio seems to be really enjoying their day out in nature.

Kim's been showing off the family's new western style lately, even sharing a snap of Saint and Chicago dressed up like cowboys.

Not Moving!

View photos

Kim recently spoke openly about the West's love for Wyoming.

Sitting down with Jimmy Fallon on Wednesday to promote her cosmetics collaboration with Winnie Harlow, she spilled the country tea.

Despite rumors Kim and Kanye are planning to move their family to the western state, the reality star said it's not happening because she loves Los Angeles more.

And when they want to escape and get away from the city hustle, she told Fallon they have a place to go because Kanye bought a ranch.

Kanye!

View photos

Kanye loves to go to Wyoming and work on new music, which is exactly what he's doing right now.

'Ye even flew close friends and family to the rural area for an album release party last year.

Old Town Road!

This isn't the first time Kim's showed off her cowboy crew.

Remember when North threw on some western gear and danced to "Old Town Road?"

Now, THAT was gold!
